alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Karnes, southeastern Atascosa and southwestern Wilson Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pleasanton to near Christine to Cross. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Christine, Campbellton, Falls City, Cestohowa, Coy City, Zunkerville, Fashing, Coughran, Hobson, El Oso, Peggy, Deweesville and McCoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Texas.
